title: Konpora Kid
synopsis: The time is set in the Mechatronics Era in the future. In this era, schools actually float in the Tokyo sky at around 2000 - 3000 metres. At home, there is freedom in movement as everyone has a flight mechanism within them which allows them to fly. Transportation is made easy as a result.
staff: [['Endou, Yuuji', ['Producer', ' Episode Director']], ['Morishita, Kouzou', ['Director']], ['Yanagawa, Shigeru', ['Director', ' Script']], ['Yamauchi, Shigeyasu', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
